mapper.select: select bl.bcode, bl.bname, bl.btype, c.ccode, c.cname,(CASE bl.btype WHEN 1 THEN 'board' WHEN 2 THEN 'reboard' WHEN 3 THEN 'bbs' WHEN 4 THEN 'album' END) controller from board_list bl, category c where bl.ccode = c.ccode and c.ccode != 8 order by bl.bcode

select * from (select (@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1) rn, b.SEQ, b.SUBJECT, b.CONTENT, case when date_format(b.logtime, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') then date_format(b.logtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(b.logtime, '%Y-%m-%d') end logtime, c.CNAME, al.SAVEFOLDER, al.SAVE_PICTURE from board b, board_list bl, category c, album al where b.BCODE = bl.BCODE and c.CCODE = bl.CCODE and b.SEQ = al.SEQ order by logtime asc ) hl,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) AS X limit 4
